article.description: Phillip Whittington scored a career-high 25 points on 12-of-14 shooting, Michael Buchanan had a double-double and South Carolina Upstate rolled to a 91-59 win over Florida College.
article.headline: South Carolina Upstate defeats Florida College 91-59
article.linkText: South Carolina Upstate defeats Florida College 91-59
article.story: SPARTANBURG, S.C. -- Phillip Whittington scored a career-high 25 points on 12-of-14 shooting, Michael Buchanan had a double-double and South Carolina Upstate rolled to a 91-59 win over Florida College on Tuesday night. Buchanan had 19 points and 13 rebounds, Malik Moore had 16 points and Mike Cunningham 10 for the Spartans (8-7), who took control with a 20-2 run in the first half. Whittington, who was one point shy of his career-best, and Buchanan had 13 points apiece in the first half when Upstate opened a 39-25 lead. Zach Brock had 15 of his of his 18 points in the second half for the Falcons, a USCAA school. Anthony Allen added 13 points. The Spartans had a 48-14 advantage on points in the paint and 20-2 on second chance points, built with 16 offensive rebounds and a 44-28 rebounding advantage.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
